attributes.action: We call upon the Government to use Road Tax for ROADS!!
attributes.additional_details: Facebook and tweets from all over the Country back this up and it is time the Government got its act together, and used the road tax for what it should be used for, fixing our roads, and making driving safer, and causing less damage to our cars
attributes.background: Many thousands of people from everywhere in Britain are complaining about the roads  with potholes,and damage to their cars! Drivers are stung with road tax which is used for other purposes, than what it should be used for

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Road repairs, such as potholes, are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

If you would like the Government to give more funding to councils for road care, you might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/210838
